item.title: Estimating weld passes on a heavy repair
item.description: This video focuses on a large-scale welding repair and the multiple weld passes required for strength and durability. A practical look at preparation, technique, and patience in heavy equipment work. How many passes would you expect?

media:content.media:title: Estimating weld passes on a heavy repair
media:content.media:description: This video focuses on a large-scale welding repair and the multiple weld passes required for strength and durability. A practical look at preparation, technique, and patience in heavy equipment work. How many passes would you expect?

item.title: Broaching keyways for a custom grinder pulley
item.description: A close look at broaching keyways into pulleys made for a heavy-duty tool post grinder. This video highlights precision machining and shop-made tooling in action. Why is accurate keyway broaching so important?

item.title: Repairing a cracked weld in a hydraulic cylinder
item.description: A step-by-step look at repairing a cracked weld in a hydraulic cylinder, with a focus on welding technique, machining, and safety checks. How do professionals ensure a reliable repair after failure?

item.title: Setting up an advanced metal spray system
item.description: We’re installing a modern metal spray system designed for precision surface repair and engineering applications. This video highlights setup, capabilities, and workshop integration. How does metal spray improve component lifespan?

item.title: Firing up the Klopp 1000H shaper
item.description: Watch the Klopp 1000H Shaper come back to life as it’s started up in the workshop. A look at classic machining equipment and the role it still plays today. What makes machines like this endure?

item.title: Upgrading storage in the workshop
item.description: It’s time for a workshop storage upgrade. See how improved organization supports efficiency, safety, and smoother daily operations in a machining environment. What changes make the biggest difference on the shop floor?

item.title: Precision repair using line boring and welding
item.description: This video shows precision repair using line boring and bore welding to restore worn components. A focused look at accuracy, alignment, and long-term durability. Why are these techniques critical in heavy equipment repair?

item.title: Rebuilding a 150-tonne hydraulic jacking cylinder
item.description: A full rebuild of a 150-tonne hydraulic jacking cylinder, from disassembly to final inspection. This video highlights machining accuracy, repair methods, and reliability in heavy-duty equipment. What goes into restoring a cylinder of this scale?

item.title: Oxy gas cutting bevels on a D11 ripper shank
item.description: See oxy gas cutting used to cut precise bevels on a Caterpillar D11 ripper shank. A practical look at weld preparation in heavy equipment workshops. Why is proper beveling so important?

item.title: Our Very Own Australian Made Machine From The 1970's!
item.description: This video showcases our Australian-made machine from the 1970s, highlighting its build quality and continued role in modern machining work. How have older machines stood the test of time?

item.title: Machining A New Cylinder Machining a new cylinder rod for a CAT D10Rod for A CAT D10 Bulldozer
item.description: Watch the precision machining of a new cylinder rod for a Caterpillar D10 bulldozer. A close look at tolerances, materials, and techniques used in heavy equipment repair. What makes a cylinder rod reliable in the field?

item.title: Opening the floor for a Q&A session
item.description: We’re inviting questions from our audience about machining, engineering, and workshop life. A chance to share knowledge and discuss real-world experience. What would you like to ask us?

item.title: Inside our SIP jig borer tooling collection
item.description: Take a closer look at our tooling setup for a SIP jig borer. This video highlights the tools we rely on for accurate machining and consistent results. What makes a tooling collection truly effective?

item.title: When a 150-tonne jacking cylinder fails on site
item.description: A real-world look at a 150-tonne jacking cylinder failure during an engineering job. We break down what went wrong, the challenges faced, and why safety and diagnostics matter in heavy machinery work. What can be learned from this failure?

item.title: Buying a lathe and an unexpected bonus
item.description: We share the experience of purchasing a lathe and discovering an unexpected advantage along the way. What factors make a used machine purchase turn out well?

item.title: Precision metal arc spraying on a D11 yoke
item.description: See how a D11 yoke is restored using metal arc spraying with the Metallisation i450. A close look at surface engineering in a heavy-duty workshop, supporting reliability in Caterpillar machinery. How does this process extend component life?

item.title: Preparing a heavy-duty tool post grinder
item.description: Follow the setup and preparation of a heavy-duty tool post grinder, focusing on adjustments, planning, and machining requirements. What steps are critical before putting this tool to work?

item.title: High-precision machinery at work
item.description: A closer look at precision machinery performing at a very high standard, highlighting accuracy, build quality, and engineering detail. What defines true precision in modern machining?

item.title: Building Heavy-Duty Rollers from Scratch
item.description: Watch the machining process behind creating durable, heavy-duty rollers designed for strength and reliability. From material choice to final fit, what makes a roller truly built to last?

item.title: Building a Custom Mount for a High-End Camera
item.description: Follow the step-by-step process of designing and fabricating a custom mount built to safely support a professional-grade camera. What goes into making sure precision equipment stays secure in real-world conditions?
